(numRobEntries, area_cell_area).explanation: Increasing the number of ROB entries requires more physical storage cells, directly increasing the cell area needed to implement the larger reorder buffer structure;

(numRobEntries, power_register).explanation: More ROB entries mean more register storage elements that consume power for maintaining state, directly increasing register-related power consumption;

(numRobEntries, nL2TLBEntries).explanation: ROB size and L2 TLB entries are independent design parameters that serve different functions in the processor architecture;
